This is the simplest WiFi remote for Boxee you\'ll find!\nWith only your thumb, you can control your Boxee. You don\'t even have to look at the remove UI!
Navigation with this remote is done by swipe gestures: swipe your thumb up, to navigate up in Boxee. Swipe down to navigate down, etc. Tap to select an item in Boxee.\nSimple, ah?

There are other features too:
 * Auto detection of a Boxee server.
 * Physical BACK button is mapped to Boxee's BACK.
 * Android soft-keyboard will send keys to Boxee, e.g., when there is a text-box open in Boxee.
 * Automatically pauses a playing video upon a phone call!
 * And more!
There are some settings (and a link to this help) from the MENU.
